Misconfigurations.Title: Manage secrets
Misconfigurations.Description: Viewing secrets at the cluster-scope is akin to cluster-admin in most clusters as there are typically at least one service accounts (their token stored in a secret) bound to cluster-admin directly or a role/clusterrole that gives similar permissions.
Misconfigurations.Message: ClusterRole 'apecloud-oteld' shouldn't have access to manage resource 'secrets'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Manage secrets are not allowed. Remove resource 'secrets' from cluster role

Misconfigurations.Title: Do not allow privilege escalation from node proxy
Misconfigurations.Description: Check whether role permits privilege escalation from node proxy
Misconfigurations.Message: Role permits privilege escalation from node proxy
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Create a role which does not permit privilege escalation from node proxy

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: clusterrole apecloud-oteld in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: clusterrolebinding apecloud-oteld in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: configmap apecloud-oteld-pg12-queries in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: configmap apecloud-oteld-pg14-queries in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: ConfigMap with sensitive content
Misconfigurations.Description: Storing sensitive content such as usernames and email addresses in configMaps is unsafe
Misconfigurations.Message: ConfigMap 'apecloud-oteld.config' in 'default' namespace stores sensitive contents in key(s) or value(s) '{"          ## username", "          username"}'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Remove sensitive content from configMap data value

Misconfigurations.Title: ConfigMap with secrets
Misconfigurations.Description: Storing secrets in configMaps is unsafe
Misconfigurations.Message: ConfigMap 'apecloud-oteld.config' in 'default' namespace stores secrets in key(s) or value(s) '{"          password"}'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Remove password/secret from configMap data value

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: configmap apecloud-oteld.config in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: configmap apecloud-oteld.kbengine in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Can elevate its own privileges
Misconfigurations.Description: A program inside the container can elevate its own privileges and run as root, which might give the program control over the container and node.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'apecloud-oteld' of DaemonSet 'apecloud-oteld' should set 'securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation' to false
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'set containers[].securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation' to 'false'.

Misconfigurations.Title: Default capabilities: some containers do not drop all
Misconfigurations.Description: The container should drop all default capabilities and add only those that are needed for its execution.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'apecloud-oteld' of DaemonSet 'apecloud-oteld' should add 'ALL' to 'securityContext.capabilities.drop'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Add 'ALL' to containers[].securityContext.capabilities.drop.

Misconfigurations.Title: Access to host network
Misconfigurations.Description: Sharing the host’s network namespace permits processes in the pod to communicate with processes bound to the host’s loopback adapter.
Misconfigurations.Message: DaemonSet 'apecloud-oteld' should not set 'spec.template.spec.hostNetwork' to true
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Do not set 'spec.template.spec.hostNetwork' to true.

Misconfigurations.Title: Access to host PID
Misconfigurations.Description: Sharing the host’s PID namespace allows visibility on host processes, potentially leaking information such as environment variables and configuration.
Misconfigurations.Message: DaemonSet 'apecloud-oteld' should not set 'spec.template.spec.hostPID' to true
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Do not set 'spec.template.spec.hostPID' to true.

Misconfigurations.Title: CPU not limited
Misconfigurations.Description: Enforcing CPU limits prevents DoS via resource exhaustion.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'apecloud-oteld' of DaemonSet 'apecloud-oteld' should set 'resources.limits.cpu'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set a limit value under 'containers[].resources.limits.cpu'.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs as root user
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the running image to run as a non-root user to ensure least privileges.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'apecloud-oteld' of DaemonSet 'apecloud-oteld' should set 'securityContext.runAsNonRoot' to true
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsNonRoot' to true.

Misconfigurations.Title: CPU requests not specified
Misconfigurations.Description: When containers have resource requests specified, the scheduler can make better decisions about which nodes to place pods on, and how to deal with resource contention.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'apecloud-oteld' of DaemonSet 'apecloud-oteld' should set 'resources.requests.cpu'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].resources.requests.cpu'.

Misconfigurations.Title: Memory requests not specified
Misconfigurations.Description: When containers have memory requests specified, the scheduler can make better decisions about which nodes to place pods on, and how to deal with resource contention.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'apecloud-oteld' of DaemonSet 'apecloud-oteld' should set 'resources.requests.memory'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].resources.requests.memory'.

Misconfigurations.Title: Privileged
Misconfigurations.Description: Privileged containers share namespaces with the host system and do not offer any security. They should be used exclusively for system containers that require high privileges.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'apecloud-oteld' of DaemonSet 'apecloud-oteld' should set 'securityContext.privileged' to false
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Change 'containers[].securityContext.privileged' to 'false'.

Misconfigurations.Title: Memory not limited
Misconfigurations.Description: Enforcing memory limits prevents DoS via resource exhaustion.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'apecloud-oteld' of DaemonSet 'apecloud-oteld' should set 'resources.limits.memory'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set a limit value under 'containers[].resources.limits.memory'.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with UID <= 10000
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the container to run with user ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the host’s user table.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'apecloud-oteld' of DaemonSet 'apecloud-oteld' should set 'securityContext.runAsUser' > 10000
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsUser' to an integer > 10000.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with GID <= 10000
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the container to run with group ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the host’s user table.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'apecloud-oteld' of DaemonSet 'apecloud-oteld' should set 'securityContext.runAsGroup' > 10000
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to an integer > 10000.

Misconfigurations.Title: hostPath volumes mounted
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'HostPath Volumes', HostPath volumes must be forbidden.
Misconfigurations.Message: DaemonSet 'apecloud-oteld' should not set 'spec.template.volumes.hostPath'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Do not set 'spec.volumes[*].hostPath'.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runtime/Default Seccomp profile not set
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Seccomp', the RuntimeDefault seccomp profile must be required, or allow specific additional profiles.
Misconfigurations.Message: Either Pod or Container should set 'securityContext.seccompProfile.type' to 'RuntimeDefault'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'spec.securityContext.seccompProfile.type', 'spec.containers[*].securityContext.seccompProfile' and 'spec.initContainers[*].securityContext.seccompProfile' to 'RuntimeDefault' or undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Seccomp policies disabled
Misconfigurations.Description: A program inside the container can bypass Seccomp protection policies.
Misconfigurations.Message: container apecloud-oteld of daemonset apecloud-oteld in default namespace should specify a seccomp profile
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Specify seccomp either by annotation or by seccomp profile type having allowed values as per pod security standards

Misconfigurations.Title: Containers must not set runAsUser to 0
Misconfigurations.Description: Containers should be forbidden from running with a root UID.
Misconfigurations.Message: securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a value greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'securityContext.runAsUser' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Container capabilities must only include NET_BIND_SERVICE
Misconfigurations.Description: Containers must drop ALL capabilities, and are only permitted to add back the NET_BIND_SERVICE capability.
Misconfigurations.Message: container should drop all
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'spec.containers[*].securityContext.capabilities.drop' to 'ALL' and only add 'NET_BIND_SERVICE' to 'spec.containers[*].securityContext.capabilities.add'.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: daemonset apecloud-oteld in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Kubernetes resource with disallowed volumes mounted
Misconfigurations.Description: HostPath present many security risks and as a security practice it is better to avoid critical host paths mounts.
Misconfigurations.Message: daemonset apecloud-oteld in default namespace shouldn't have volumes set to {"/"}
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Do not Set 'spec.volumes[*].hostPath.path' to any of the disallowed volumes.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: service apecloud-oteld in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: service apecloud-oteld-l8s-metric in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: serviceaccount apecloud-oteld in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.
